name: DiagnosticDBTStudy
title: Diagnostic DBT Study
description: This value set is associated with the "Breast Cancer Screening Recall Rates" measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (OQR) Program. It is also referred to as "OP-39."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains HCPCS codes associated with screening studies used to identify breast cancer in men and women.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who underwent a diagnostic digital breast tomosynthesis (DBT).),(Inclusion Criteria: HCPCS codes that identify breast diagnostic imaging studies performed using DBT are captured in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes not associated with breast diagnostic are excluded from this value set. Similarly, codes from alternative terminologies other than HCPCS are excluded from this value set.)

concept.display: Diagnostic digital breast tomosynthesis, unilateral or bilateral (list separately in addition to 77065 or 77066)

contains.display: Diagnostic digital breast tomosynthesis, unilateral or bilateral (list separately in addition to 77065 or 77066)
